item.title: Kick just reboots you
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

when i do ::kick username, it just DCs them and logs them back in, how do i make it so they can’t log back in for like, 2 minutes? command is

if (command.startsWith("kick")) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5); sendMessage("You kicked " + command.substring(5)); System.out.println( "Staff Member" + playerName + " is kicking " + command.substring(5)); ; }
